attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: My petition is fathers have no right to look after their children or spouses when they have long term illness, under the currnet employment laws it is down to the employers whether or not you can have time off to look after your dependants. Otherwise you are have you to choose between your partner or job if they disagree.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
